alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 11 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Arkansas and Louisiana, including the following counties and parishes, in Arkansas, Columbia, Hempstead, Lafayette, Miller, Nevada and Union. In Louisiana, Bienville, Bossier, Caddo, Caldwell, Claiborne, De Soto, Jackson, Lincoln, Ouachita, Red River, Union and Webster. * WHEN...From Midnight CDT tonight through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
